alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 2:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Flagler, east central Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 245 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lake George, or near Salt Springs, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Palm Coast, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Crescent City, Andalusia, Juniper Springs, Marineland, Beverly Beach, Espanola and Georgetown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler
